Play:
The Subscription List
(Kanjinchō / 勧進帳)

Written By: Namiki Gohei (並木五瓶)

First Staged: 1895

Reference: Hironaga, Shūzaburō, The Bunraku Handbook (Tokyo: Maison des Arts, 1976); Bunraku July 1990 Performance Program

– Click image to view.

Performances:

July 1971: The Subscription List

January 1975: The Subscription List

July 1978: The Subscription List

July 1983: The Subscription List

July 1990: The Subscription List

April 1995: The Subscription List

July/August 2001: The Subscription List

August 1970: The Subscription List

Characters:

Benkei (Musashibō Benkei / 武蔵坊弁慶)

Togashi (Togashino Saemon (Togashinosuke Masahiro) / 富樫左衛門 (富樫之介正広))

Yoshitsune Minamoto (Minamotono Yoshitsune / 源義経)

Ise (Iseno Saburō / 伊勢三郎)

Suruga (Surugano Jirō / 駿河次郎)

Hachiro Kataoka (Kataoka Hachirō / 片岡八郎)

Hitachibo (Hitachibō Kaison / 常陸坊 (常陸坊海尊))

Barrier guards (Bansotsu / 番卒)

Sachuta (Kajishita Sachūta / 梶下左忠太)
